item.title: The Abuse Management Bot was renamed to Administrator
item.description: The Abuse Management bot was renamed to Administrator like in the official matrix rooms before. This should make it easier to understand it’s purpose for new users.

item.title: Python Space Announcement
item.description: Upon request of our community we created and announced the new Python Space  #python-space:matrix.org . This new Space includes Python rooms recommend by the community.

item.title: Spaces Announcement
item.description: We announced our community Space and two new rooms: Community Space – contains our rooms:  #python-community:matrix.org Meta room – for organizational questions, suggestions & proposals:  #python-meta:matrix.org Offtopic room – for everything off-topic:  #python-off-topic:matrix.org

item.title: The Website development started
item.description: Michael started the development of this website. His idea was, to create a simple “entrypoint” for new Members of the community and a notice board for those, whom might be interested joining us. The initial commit was on Oct, 10 2021. The release and announcement was on XXX. ðŸš§ Coming Soon This part of our new Website is not ready yet. raise NotImplementedError("Stay Tuned")

item.title: Change Room Address
item.description: We changed the main address of the Python room to #python:matrix.org

item.title: The Abuse Management Bot Joined the Moderation Team
item.description: The Abuse Management bot (now known as “Administrator”) was deployed to the server. After a few days of intense testing, the bot joined the Python room and started protecting the users from spam. Since then the bot watches our rooms room 24/7.

item.title: James Joined the Moderation Team
item.description: James Belchamber wrote an email to the matrix team, to urge them, to clean up the old room from spam. Instead they “tombstoned” the old room into ours and assigned us the room identifier #python:matrix.org. On the same day James joined the moderation team.

item.title: Code of Conduct & BrenBarn Joined the Moderation Team
item.description: Our Code of Conduct was created. Just a few days later BrenBarn joined the moderation team.

item.title: The Python Room Was Created
item.description: Like every good story, at least on Matrix, ours starts with an m.room.create event, when the Python room was created on Thu, Dec 31 2020 00:00:23 (UTC) by Michael. The room identifier was Python3:matrix.org, since #python:matrix.org was still used by the “old Python” room, which was abandoned by the administrator and bombarded with spam messages. A few hours later the spammers joined from the old room started their attack on our new room.
